TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsItem extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示包含短语或用户可以调用产生成功的识别的其他实体的语法元素。

span.span: Represents a grammar element that contains phrases or other entities that a user can speak to produce a successful recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以包含短语、实体（如 对象）、短语和对象的逻辑组合等等 。An object can consist of phrases, entities such as objects, logical combinations of phrases and objects, and so on. 您可以使用 类的属性 来获取对对象的子集的访问权限 。You can use the property on the class to gain access to the constituents of an object. 对象在给定对象中的显示顺序 指定用户必须对其进行口述的顺序。The order in which objects appear in a given object specifies the order in which a user must speak them. 默认情况下，的内容 必须只朗读一次。By default, the contents of an must be spoken exactly once. 若要指定 必须重复朗读的内容，请使用 构造函数并设置 `repeatCount` 参数。To specify that the contents of an must be spoken repeatedly, use the constructor and set the `repeatCount` parameter. 同样，若要为可朗读的次数指定范围 ，请 使用设置 属性和属性的构造函数之一创建 。Similarly, to specify a range for the number of times that an can be spoken, create the with one of the constructors that set the property and the property. 如果 已存在，则可以使用 或 方法之一来指定重复项。If the already exists, you can use one of the or the methods to specify repeats. 还可以通过设置属性的值来指定重复进行项目的概率 。You can also specify the probability that an item will be repeatedly spoken by setting the value of the property. 对象内的对象 包含用户可以从中进行口述的替代项的列表。 objects within an object comprise a list of alternatives from which the user can speak one. 您可以使用 属性来指定将在列表中的给定项被口述的可能性。You can use the property to specify the likelihood that a given item in the list will be spoken. 类表示 `item` 在万维网联合会 (W3C) [语音识别语法规范中定义的元素 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。The class represents the `item` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 有关 SRGS 元素的信息 `item` 以及有关其对 system.object 的支持的详细信息，请参阅 [item 元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/ms870124(v=msdn.10))。For information about the SRGS `item` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [item Element](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/ms870124(v=msdn.10)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置此属性，请使用 方法。To set this property, use the method. 此属性表示 `repeat` 万维网联合会 (W3C) 语音识别语法规范定义的属性的一部分 [ (SRGS) 版本 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。This property represents a portion of the `repeat` attribute defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将会重复此 实例内容的可能性。

span.span: Gets or sets the probability that a user will repeat the contents of this instance.

value.span: 概率，作为浮点值，此项目内容将重复调用。

span.span: The probability, as a floating point value, that the contents of this item will be repeatedly spoken.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于 已显式设置为非默认值的项，方法是使用或方法的构造函数 。The property applies only to items whose and properties have been explicitly set to non-default values, either by a constructor for or by the method.

exception.span: 尝试设置 为负或大于 1.0 的值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set to a value that is negative or larger than 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Weight { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.Weight : single with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置可以调整 对象中的 将会被朗读的可能性的倍数因子。

span.span: Gets or sets a multiplying factor that adjusts the likelihood that an in a object will be spoken.

value.span: 调整要拼写此项的可能性的浮点值。

span.span: A floating point value that adjusts the likelihood of this item being spoken.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为1.0，它等效于项的权重。The default value of this property is 1.0, which is equivalent to no weighting of the item. 如果权重大于1.0，则会有可能会说出物品的可能性，而小于1.0 的权重会对项目的讲述可能性产生负面影响。A weight greater than 1.0 positively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken, and a weight less than 1.0 negatively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken. 此属性仅与 实例内的对象相关 ; 在所有其他情况下，此属性将被忽略。This property is relevant only to objects within an instance; it is ignored in all other cases.

exception.span: 尝试将 设置为负值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set to a negative value.
